name: Borba is down. Francisco is next. [Shrouded Landmarks spin-off]
description:
24/07/2021. Borba Gato, after Edward Colston, Henry Dundas, Leopold, Robert E. Lee and even Churchill, fell. This model is a dream. A dream were an "ex-"nazi state is once again shocked, but now not only with some negationist pastors' outdoor falling, but the municipal slaver himself burning: Francisco Dias Velho.
Down with slavery! Down with the coronelist police State!

Twitter @pedioscorides Ig @pdioscorides
